servers.name: AWS KB Retrieval
servers.description: An MCP server implementation for retrieving information from the AWS Knowledge Base using the Bedrock Agent Runtime.

servers.name: Brave Search
servers.description: An MCP server implementation that integrates the Brave Search API, providing both web and local search capabilities.

servers.name: EverArt
servers.description: Image generation server using EverArt's API.

servers.name: Fetch
servers.description: A Model Context Protocol server that provides web content fetching capabilities. This server enables LLMs to retrieve and process content from web pages, converting HTML to markdown for easier consumption.

servers.name: Filesystem
servers.description: Node.js server implementing Model Context Protocol (MCP) for filesystem operations.

servers.name: Google Drive
servers.description: This MCP server integrates with Google Drive to allow listing, reading, and searching over files.

servers.name: Git
servers.description: A Model Context Protocol server for Git repository interaction and automation. This server provides tools to read, search, and manipulate Git repositories via Large Language Models.

servers.name: GitHub
servers.description: MCP Server for the GitHub API, enabling file operations, repository management, search functionality, and more.

servers.name: GitLab
servers.description: MCP Server for the GitLab API, enabling project management, file operations, and more.

servers.name: Google Maps
servers.description: MCP Server for the Google Maps API.

servers.name: Knowledge Graph Memory
servers.description: A basic implementation of persistent memory using a local knowledge graph. This lets LLM remember information about the user across chats.

servers.name: PostgreSQL
servers.description: A Model Context Protocol server that provides read-only access to PostgreSQL databases. This server enables LLMs to inspect database schemas and execute read-only queries.

servers.name: Puppeteer
servers.description: A Model Context Protocol server that provides browser automation capabilities using Puppeteer. This server enables LLMs to interact with web pages, take screenshots, and execute JavaScript in a real browser environment.

servers.name: Redis
servers.description: A Model Context Protocol server that provides access to Redis databases. This server enables LLMs to interact with Redis key-value stores through a set of standardized tools.

servers.name: Sentry
servers.description: A Model Context Protocol server for retrieving and analyzing issues from Sentry.io. This server provides tools to inspect error reports, stacktraces, and other debugging information from your Sentry account.

servers.name: Sequential Thinking
servers.description: An MCP server implementation that provides a tool for dynamic and reflective problem-solving through a structured thinking process.

servers.name: Slack
servers.description: An MCP server for the Slack API and interact with Slack workspaces.

servers.name: SQLite
servers.description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server implementation that provides database interaction and business intelligence capabilities through SQLite. This server enables running SQL queries, analyzing business data, and automatically generating business insight memos.

servers.name: Time
servers.description: A Model Context Protocol server that provides time and timezone conversion capabilities. This server enables LLMs to get current time information and perform timezone conversions using IANA timezone names, with automatic system timezone detection.

servers.name: Axiom
servers.description: Query and analyze logs, traces, and event data using natural language using Axiom Processing Language (APL).

servers.name: Cloudflare
servers.description: Deploy and manage resources on the Cloudflare developer platform

servers.name: E2B (JS)
servers.description: Execute code in secure cloud sandboxes by E2B

servers.name: E2B (Python)
servers.description: Execute code in secure cloud sandboxes by E2B

servers.name: Neon
servers.description: Interact with the Neon serverless Postgres platform

servers.name: Obsidian
servers.description: Read and search through Markdown notes in Obsidian vaults

servers.name: Qdrant
servers.description: Implement semantic memory using the Qdrant vector search engine

servers.name: Search1API
servers.description: Unified API for search, crawling, and sitemaps by Search1 API

servers.name: Stripe Agent Toolkit (Python)
servers.description: Interact with the Stripe API

servers.name: Stripe Agent Toolkit (TS)
servers.description: Interact with the Stripe API

servers.name: Docker
servers.description: Manage containers, images, volumes, and networks

servers.name: Kubernetes
servers.description: Manage pods, deployments, and services

servers.name: Linear
servers.description: Project management and issue tracking

servers.name: Spotify
servers.description: Control Spotify playback and manage playlists
